info.title: Twenty Api
info.description: This is a **Twenty REST/API** playground based on the **OpenAPI 3.0 specification**.

bearerAuth.description: Enter the token with the `Bearer: ` prefix, e.g. "Bearer abcde12345".

viewId.description: View Field related view id foreign key
View Filter related view id foreign key
View Sort related view id foreign key

isCompact.description: Describes if the view is in compact mode

authoredActivities.description: Activities created by the workspace member

assignedActivities.description: Activities assigned to the workspace member

favorites.description: Favorites linked to the workspace member

authoredAttachments.description: Attachments created by the workspace member

events.description: Events linked to the workspace member

headerMessageId.description: Message id from the message header

messageThreadId.description: Message Thread Id id foreign key

receivedAt.description: The date the message was received

MessageChannelMessageAssociation.description: Message Synced with a Message Channel

messageExternalId.description: Message id from the messaging provider

messageThreadExternalId.description: Thread id from the messaging provider

messageChannelId.description: Message Channel Id id foreign key

messageThreadId.description: Message Thread Id id foreign key

workspaceMemberId.description: Event workspace member id foreign key

domainName.description: The company website URL. We use this url to fetch the company icon

annualRecurringRevenue.description: Annual Recurring Revenue: The actual or estimated annual revenue of the company

idealCustomerProfile.description: Ideal Customer Profile:  Indicates whether the company is the most suitable and valuable customer for you

employees.description: Number of employees in the company

accountOwner.description: Your team member responsible for managing the company account

accountOwnerId.description: Your team member responsible for managing the company account id foreign key

handle.description: The account handle (email, username, phone number, etc.)

workspaceMemberId.description: Favorite workspace member id foreign key

pointOfContactId.description: Opportunity point of contact id foreign key

lastCursor.name: last_cursor
lastCursor.description: Returns objects starting from a specific cursor.

filter.name: filter
filter.description:
Filters objects returned.  
    Should have the following shape: **field_1[COMPARATOR]:value_1,field_2[COMPARATOR]:value_2,...**  
    Available comparators are **eq**, **neq**, **in**, **is**, **gt**, **gte**, **lt**, **lte**, **startsWith**, **like**, **ilike**.  
    You can create more complex filters using conjunctions **or**, **and**, **not**.  
    Default root conjunction is **and**.  
    To filter **null** values use **field[is]:NULL** or **field[is]:NOT_NULL**  
    To filter using **boolean** values use **field[eq]:true** or **field[eq]:false**

orderBy.name: order_by
orderBy.description:
Sorts objects returned.  
    Should have the following shape: **field_name_1,field_name_2[DIRECTION_2],...**  
    Available directions are **AscNullsFirst**, **AscNullsLast**, **DescNullsFirst**, **DescNullsLast**.  
    Default direction is **AscNullsFirst**

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Limits the number of objects returned.

get.description: **order_by**, **filter**, **limit**, **depth** or **last_cursor** can be provided to request your **people**
**depth** can be provided to request your **person**
**order_by**, **filter**, **limit**, **depth** or **last_cursor** can be provided to request your **viewFields**
**depth** can be provided to request your **viewField**
**order_by**, **filter**, **limit**, **depth** or **last_cursor** can be provided to request your **viewFilters**
**depth** can be provided to request your **viewFilter**
**order_by**, **filter**, **limit**, **depth** or **last_cursor** can be provided to request your **viewSorts**
**depth** can be provided to request your **viewSort**
**order_by**, **filter**, **limit**, **depth** or **last_cursor** can be provided to request your **views**
**depth** can be provided to request your **view**
**order_by**, **filter**, **limit**, **depth** or **last_cursor** can be provided to request your **webhooks**
**depth** can be provided to request your **webhook**

**depth** can be provided to request your **workspaceMember**

**depth** can be provided to request your **messageThread**

**depth** can be provided to request your **message**

**depth** can be provided to request your **messageChannel**

**depth** can be provided to request your **messageParticipant**
**order_by**, **filter**, **limit**, **depth** or **last_cursor** can be provided to request your **messageChannelMessageAssociations**
**depth** can be provided to request your **messageChannelMessageAssociation**
**order_by**, **filter**, **limit**, **depth** or **last_cursor** can be provided to request your **events**
**depth** can be provided to request your **event**
**order_by**, **filter**, **limit**, **depth** or **last_cursor** can be provided to request your **activityTargets**
**depth** can be provided to request your **activityTarget**

**order_by**, **filter**, **limit**, **depth** or **last_cursor** can be provided to request your **companies**
**depth** can be provided to request your **company**
**order_by**, **filter**, **limit**, **depth** or **last_cursor** can be provided to request your **connectedAccounts**
**depth** can be provided to request your **connectedAccount**
**order_by**, **filter**, **limit**, **depth** or **last_cursor** can be provided to request your **favorites**
